summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1706, for the improvement of McKinley Place, from Krikwood Place to Meridian Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks and wooden crosswalks, with all necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage, under Ordinance No. 18141 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
